title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS A concert at the Hollywood Bowl looks fun. I want some cozy cottage vibes. Speaking of, these kitchens are so charming. The top three states for retirees. Orcas Island is on my bucket list for sure. Let’s learn a little bit about regional soft drinks. These frosting piping skills are amazing. Cadbury chocolate bars, ranked. A tip for microwaving a potato. This is exciting news for Spaceballs fans. Is dad a gardener? He might like my favorite gardening tools. Picnic plans? I’ve got you covered from packing to food! Cute outfit dress/ heels / sunglasses Something to ask when you’re buying a house. I studied Metropolis in college. Classical art collaged into real life. A little secret about Trader Joe’s flowers. This restaurant in Brooklyn has quite a past! Moodboard: planner life Weekend reading: Mother Sauce If you need a boost to get re-motivated for 2025, join me next month for a Half-Year Reset Workshop. Here’s your chance to pause, reflect, and realign your routines so the rest of 2025 feels more intentional and energized. Half-Year Reset Workshop! excerpt: I Love Lists is a weekly roundup of the best links from around the internet, curated by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean. Discover inspiring reads, creative ideas, delicious recipes, and fun finds every week!
